about_the_game:
Experience Ultimate Combat and Master the Power of Elements!

  • Are you ready for an adrenaline rush combat experience? This action game will push your skills to the limit, letting you feel the exhilaration of seamless combos!

  • Here’s what the exciting journey is all about:

  • Smooth and Fluid Combat Controls

    Precise movement, agile dodging, and perfectly timed attacks are indispensable! Only by mastering the essence of combat can you perform stunning moves and defeat powerful enemies!

  • Diversed Weapon Choices

    With eight elements, multiple primary and secondary weapons, it offers distinct attack experience and unique mechanics! Customize your favorite weapons and create a one-of-a-kind combat style!

  • Strategy and Luck in Building Playstyles

    With over ten elements and gameplay mechanics, as well as hundreds of playstyle combinations, the game will have your strategy and luck tested! Once you build the perfect lineup, you’ll unleash earth-shattering power!

  • Thrilling and Intense Boss Fights

    Facing the boss's ferocious onslaught, you need to apply all your skills and strategies to engage in layered battles! The intense combat rhythm and unpredictable attacks make every victory immensely satisfying!

  • Surprising Random Events

    Jump into rooms filled with unknowns, overcome numerous challenges, complete random tasks, and win great rewards! Every adventure is a brand new experience!

  • Are you ready to take on the challenge? Join the battle now, master the power of elements, and become the ultimate combat master!

Experience Ultimate Combat and Master the Power of Elements!

  • Here’s what the exciting journey is all about:

  • Smooth and Fluid Combat Controls

    Precise movement, agile dodging, and perfectly timed attacks are indispensable! Only by mastering the essence of combat can you perform stunning moves and defeat powerful enemies!

  • Diversed Weapon Choices

    With eight elements, multiple primary and secondary weapons, it offers distinct attack experience and unique mechanics! Customize your favorite weapons and create a one-of-a-kind combat style!

  • Strategy and Luck in Building Playstyles

    With over ten elements and gameplay mechanics, as well as hundreds of playstyle combinations, the game will have your strategy and luck tested! Once you build the perfect lineup, you’ll unleash earth-shattering power!

  • Thrilling and Intense Boss Fights

    Facing the boss's ferocious onslaught, you need to apply all your skills and strategies to engage in layered battles! The intense combat rhythm and unpredictable attacks make every victory immensely satisfying!

  • Surprising Random Events

    Jump into rooms filled with unknowns, overcome numerous challenges, complete random tasks, and win great rewards! Every adventure is a brand new experience!

  • Are you ready to take on the challenge? Join the battle now, master the power of elements, and become the ultimate combat master!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, Mac Mini late 2012 and newer; Mac Pro late 2013 and newer; MacBook 2015 and newer
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Star Fire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K(4*3400) Or AMD FX 8350(4*4000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: This rogue-like action game will get your adrenaline pumping, combining exhilarating combat with deep strategic building! Every adventure is a brand-new beginning, you'll unlock new talents, hone your skills, and create powerful skill combinations to destroy groups of monsters ultimately! Ready？
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
